qas.question: What does Norman mean in the article when saying "Near East"?

answers.text: the countries where "the eastern question" applied

qas.question: What is the rest of the Ottoman domain demoted to?

answers.text: The rest of the Ottoman domain

context: Throughout this article Norman uses "Near East" to mean <a0_0>the countries where "the eastern question" applied<a0_0/>; that is, to all of the Balkans. The countries and regions mentioned are Greece, Bulgaria, Serbia, Bosnia-Herzegovina (which was Moslem and needed, in his view, to be suppressed), Macedonia, Montenegro, Albania, Romania. <a2_0>The rest of the Ottoman domain<a2_0/> is demoted to <a1_0>just "the east."
